Moreover, one particular scene of Phyllis at home alone simply doesn’t work. dtliExcerpt: Still, despite its imperfections, “Mother Play” is a genuinely engaging examination of a family trying to find equilibrium. It honors the glimmers and low points of mothering and explains why, in some cases, the role is transposed onto those who were never called to it in the first place.
